revision.text:
{{Actor| | type = Gore | name = Pile of guts | class = PileOfGuts | game = Strife | convid = 237 }}[[Classes]]: PileOfGuts
A large blood pool with guts. This actor has no DoomEdNum because Strife gave it the same as the [[Classes:PillarAztec|Aztec pillar]]. Since the pillar came first in the mobjinfo list, you could not spawn this in a map. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR PileOfGuts { States { Spawn: DEAD A -1 Stop } }
